Detailed Description

Font2D represents 2D font class.

Member Function Documentation

void Create (  Render2D *  render,
const Char *  name_
) 
 

Creates 2d font from specified font data file in packdir image by ASCII name.

Parameters:
render pointer to Render2D class object.
name_ pointer to ASCII name for specified image. Do not add file extension to this name.

void Draw (  Char  c,
Short  x,
Short  y,
Short *  sx = NULL,
Short *  sy = NULL
) 
 

Send single character to draw queue.

Parameters:
text pointer to ASCII text to draw.
x define x value for upper-left corner coordinate of text rectangle.
y define y value for upper-left corner coordinate of text rectangle.
sx pointer to store output text width in pixels.
sy pointer to store output text height in pixels.

Send text to draw queue.

Parameters:
text pointer to ASCII text to draw.
x define x value for upper-left corner coordinate of text rectangle.
y define y value for upper-left corner coordinate of text rectangle.
sx pointer to store output text width in pixels.
sy pointer to store output text height in pixels.

Byte GetAlpha (   ) 
 

Get alpha transparent value for font.

Parameters:
alpha_ pointer to store alpha value from 0 absolute transparent to 255 absolute opaque.

rotatation angle in Fixed degrees.

void Scale (  Fixed  x,
Fixed  y
) 
 

Set new font scale. Default value is (1,1).

Parameters:
x define new font x scale.

void SetAlpha (  Byte  alpha_  ) 
 

Set new alpha transparent value for font.

Default value is 255.

Parameters:
alpha_ define alpha value from 0 absolute transparent to 255 absolute opaque.

void SetAngle (  Fixed  angle  ) 
 

Set new font rotate angle.

Default value is 0.

Parameters:
angle define new rotate angle in Fixed degrees.

void SetColor (  Int  color_  ) 
 

Set new font color.

Default value is RGB(255,255,255).

Parameters:
color_ define new font color value. See class Color.

Set new z order for font.

Parameters:
